thread.title: Joker Reference in Wayne Security Ad for NBC's Powerless
thread.title_full: Joker Reference in Wayne Security Ad for NBC's Powerless

author: Jay Jayson
title: Joker Reference in Wayne Security Ad for NBC's Powerless

organizations.name: research and development for wayne security

text:
Joker Reference in Wayne Security Ad for NBC's Powerless Jay Jayson Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
The newest promo for Powerless , which debuts next month on NBC , is a commercial for Wayne Security and features a reference to Batman's archnemesis, The Joker. 
The commercial touts Joker Gas Anti-Venom, one of the many products the company had developed to keep people safe in a world filled with super-villains. Joker Gas, which was first introduced in Batman #1 (1940), is a chemical compound created by the Clown Prince of Crime. Those that inhale the toxin die laughing with the same maniacal grin as The Joker etched on their faces. 
Emily Locke lands her dream job as Director of Research and Development for Wayne Security in Charm City, home to super heroes and villains and citizens fed up with the collateral damage of their constant fighting. Full of confidence and big ideas, Emily quickly learns that her aspirations far exceed those of her new boss and officemates, so it will be up to her to lead the team toward their full potential and the realization that you donâ€™t need superpowers to be a hero. 
The cast: Vanessa Hudgens, Alan Tudyk, Danny Pudi, Christina Kirk, and Ron Funches. 
Justin Halpern, Patrick Schumacker, Len Goldstein, Marc Buckland and Dean Lorey are executive producers of Powerless . Buckland served as the director of the pilot. The series is produced by Warner Bros. Television and is based on the characters from DC.
